articles.title: Adobe to launch mobile app for AI image generation tool as OpenAI steps up rivalry - CNBC
articles.description: Adobe said Thursday that it will release its Firefly AI image generator on both iOS and Android "soon," without giving a specific date.

articles.title: Samsung To Reportedly Hold An Event On May 13 To Unveil The Galaxy S25 Edge, With The Ultra-Slim Flagship Apparently Launching In Three Markets Later That Month - Wccftech
articles.description: A report states that the Galaxy S25 Edge will get an official announcement on May 13, with the flagship expected to go on sale shortly after

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders were a total mess — at first - The Verge
articles.description: Nintendo’s delayed Switch 2 preorders finally kicked off in the US at 12AM ET, but there were some big problems to start.

articles.title: 'You Can't Lick a Badger Twice': Google Failures Highlight a Fundamental AI Flaw - WIRED
articles.description: Google’s AI Overviews feature credible-sounding explanations for completely made-up idioms.

articles.title: 2025's Best-Reviewed Game Can "Exist Alongside" Oblivion Remastered, Clair Obscur Star Says - GameSpot
articles.description: During an interview with GameSpot, Ben Starr says the two games releasing at the same time isn't a bad thing at all.
